Package org.opensextant.xlayer.server

Class XlayerApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Application
        • org.opensextant.xlayer.server.XlayerApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XlayerRestlet
    public abstract class XlayerApp
extends org.restlet.Application
    XlayerApp is an abstract "Webapp" running inside the Server.... well, you must implement one first.
    Author:
    ubaldino
